<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Elysium's Cadence](/Feats.aspx?ID=3752) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Aftermath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=424" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 56</row>

**Prerequisites**
You've partied extensively with an [azata](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=10) or entered a romantic relationship with an azata.

</column>

---

You've been ensnared by an azata's infectious enthusiasm for life, love, and freedom that manifests as a pearlescent afterimage in your graceful movements, a spring in your soft steps, an ever-present melody in your euphonic voice, and eddies of passionate colors in your mesmerizing eyes. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50), or a +2 circumstance bonus if the target is chaotic good. You gain the Set Free reaction.

 **Set Free** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You attempt a check to remove or [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) an effect with the [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6), [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14), [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) conditions; **Effect** You roll twice and use the better result.
name: Elysium's Cadence
prerequisite: You've partied extensively with an azata or entered a romantic relationship with an azata.
